Coupon.Progect.CouponProject.Exeptions

Class CustomExeptionHendler

  • java.lang.Object
    • Coupon.Progect.CouponProject.Exeptions.CustomExeptionHendler

  • @ControllerAdvice
public class CustomExeptionHendler
extends java.lang.Object
    A CLASS that handles all the Exceptions that are thrown from the Server. and present a user friendly message
    Author:
    pavel
